mapper.select: SELECT o_code, m_id_order, shopping_cart_group, order_total_price, delivery_state, purchase_state, payment_method, request_term, order_type, purchase_date FROM `order` AS o WHERE o.m_id_order = #{sessionId}
mapper.insert:
/* order_detail_code 자동증가 코드 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(order_detail_code) = 0 THEN 'od_code_1' ELSE CONCAT( 'od_code_', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(order_detail_code, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) + 1 ) END AS orderDetailCode FROM order_detail
INSERT INTO order_detail (order_detail_code, o_code, goods_code, o_seller_id, supp_code, order_qty, order_price) VALUES (#{orderDetailCode}, #{oCode}, #{goodsCode}, #{oSellerId}, #{suppCode}, #{orderQty}, #{orderPrice})

mapper.select: SELECT s.supp_id AS 'suppId', sm.supp_code AS 'suppCode' FROM sell_medicine AS sm INNER JOIN supplier AS s ON sm.supp_code = s.supp_code WHERE sm.goods_code = #{goodsCode};
